Factory

Class BouncyBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • Factory.DeployableObject
      • Factory.BouncyBall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deployable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class BouncyBall
extends DeployableObject
implements java.lang.Runnable
    BouncyBall is a deployable object. It moves through the factory and interacts with the objects. Only have 5 bouncy balls at one time

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Factory.DeployableObject

        canvas, collision, graphics, hitBeam, hitDeadly, running, x, xd, xSize, y, yd, ySize
